scripts.postinstall: patch-package --silent || true && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const root='node_modules/@zackmans/baileys';if(!fs.existsSync(root))process.exit(0);const patterns=['Modified Baileys','modified Baileys','@zckmans','thank you for using my modified Baileys','------------------------------','import chalk'];const walk=(dir)=>{for(const e of fs.readdirSync(dir,{withFileTypes:true})){const p=path.join(dir,e.name);if(e.isDirectory())walk(p);else if(e.isFile()&&(p.endsWith('.js')||p.endsWith('.cjs')||p.endsWith('.mjs'))){let t=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');let lines=t.split(/\\r?\\n/);let filtered=lines.filter(l=>!patterns.some(s=>l.includes(s)));if(filtered.length!==lines.length)fs.writeFileSync(p,filtered.join('\\n'),'utf8');}}};walk(root);"
